 Get to know ‘My Student Centre’ in the Student Information System (SIS) 
 My Student Centre is your self-service dashboard in the  MyConcordia portal . 
 More self-serve options 
 My Student Centre  includes features to manage your student-related tasks online, like registering for or dropping courses, using automated waitlists, building a personalized schedule, paying fees and more. 
 How To guides 
 Here you will find resources – and who to contact if you need help.
